title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Smartphone-Based Pest Management Video Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify key pests (white-backed planthoppers) with 90% accuracy
Learners can estimate pest density with 85% accuracy using field measurement tools
Learners can score over 80 points in project-based assessments based on video learning content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
